website_summaries.verdict: An affordably priced, durable product that is backed by a commitment to customer service.
pros: Bonnlo pays attention to detail with this offering
The handles are coated for improved grip and the rope is covered in a protective nylon sleeve to increase durability
It is available in 1.5-inch or 2-inch diameters and three different lengths (3 feet, 4 feet, 50 feet)
cons: As with many other brands, the mounting hardware must be purchased separately

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: These are heavy duty and very well made. We’ve been extremely pleased with these battle ropes. They are a perfect addition to our home gym.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Good battle rope, but weak handle material
customer_reviews.text: This is my fist battle rope. For what it is, 30 ft of thick rope with 2 plastic shrink wrapped handles with a cover, it is pretty expensive at over $40. The plastic on the handles is pretty weak. After only a few uses, the handles already look roughed up. This makes me think they won’t last very long. The rope itself seems decent, but you cannot tell if there are issues because of the cover. The cover keeps the rope clean, which is great since I mostly use it in the grass or near dirt.
customer_reviews.author: kazper

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Ropes, totally worth it!
customer_reviews.text: These ropes are the real deal! Went from using 1" ropes to these 2" and the difference is night and day! 100% worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: RavenAviator

customer_reviews.title: 2” 30’ Battle Rope - Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I never worked out with a battle rope before but I figured “how hard can it be?” Well...it’s hard! This battle rope humbled me. It’s great cardio and full body workout! I hooked it up outside where I have a cement-paved surface and the protective covering makes a difference. I’m recovering from a stroke so I can only handle one side with both hands. The grip is large enough and comfortable to hang on to. I’m definitely adding it as part of my routine.
customer_reviews.author: ZenRunner

customer_reviews.title: Made for me
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 74 tear old male, and this is my second rope purchase. I first purchased a 2"x 50' rope. This turned out to be too much for me at this time, so I ordered the 1 1/2"x 50' size. It's too soon to rate durability, but the grip is perfect, and the price seemed very reasonable. I find the weight is a challenge but do-able; after all, I'm trying to build strength.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Battle Rope
customer_reviews.text: Love my battle rope. The covering over the rope helps to preserve it and I love that. It doesn't affect my use at all. I'm not a battle rope expert so for me it's two thumbs up because it works without any problems after being used at least twice a week for two months.
customer_reviews.author: Progressing

customer_reviews.title: Great Rope! Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this rope. Glad I purchased the 50' sleeved rope. Built really well. Has held up to numerous rough training sessions with no apparent wear. The rubber handles are shrunk fit over the sleeve, and with rope gloves are easy to grip. At 50# my clients are improving their grip, and I hear it half way through every rope exercise. Lol!
customer_reviews.author: penpal

customer_reviews.title: Must buy/ Great Workout!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this rope!! It’s a great workout for the entire body. I got the 50 because I wanted to make sure it was going to be challenging and it is!!💪🏻💪🏻😃 Also the protective cover is a must if you want it to last.
customer_reviews.author: W. Hardy

customer_reviews.title: Great Addition to home gym
customer_reviews.text: I am really enjoying this recent addition to my home gym. The protective enclosure covering the actual rope gives it a very classy appearance. 40' long × 1.5 " thick, offers me the resistance and challenge I desire .
customer_reviews.author: Regalren

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my home gym! Researched awhile before deciding on these. Like they’re wrapped. Think that’ll stop any unraveling. These kick my ass every single time. Truly a full body workout. So fun! I feel they give me a much better aerobic workout than running ever does. And in less time!
customer_reviews.author: gocavman

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Installed ropes in my basement. Perfect weight and length for my needs. Handles are comfortable, ropes doesn’t get messy from the protective cover. Good product
customer_reviews.author: SaraM

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: This rope is amazing. Doing cardio with my arms is a great workout!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Rope is heavy and provides a solid workout, well made with protective cover, ends are solid for grip, recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: James Allen Bailey jr

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to basement workout room
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed/wanted and provides a good aerobic workout without going to gym
customer_reviews.author: Hot Rod

customer_reviews.title: Heavy
customer_reviews.text: It’s heavy and feels like it’ll hold up well over time the fact that this has a sleeve over it a plus for me and overall this was a good buy
customer_reviews.author: Josh P

customer_reviews.title: Great quality worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Love this rope for being on lockdown. It is great. Only wish I had bought the 50' rope.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Heavy and protective sleeve is great
customer_reviews.text: Great value, very strong ropes and the cover is perfect. For inside Or out. This size is heavy and will give your a serious work out. Love them
customer_reviews.author: SMACKDOWN

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic customer service
customer_reviews.text: The item was suppose to have been delivered, but, was either delivered to the wrong house or stolen off the porch. Bonnlo had my new product shipped within 2 days with no hassles. The rope is durable and top quality for the money spent. I will be ordering the 2" 50 ft for summer workouts
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Whew!
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty. You get a real work out. Great quality. It appears to be well built. Slowly building my strength
customer_reviews.author: cici

customer_reviews.title: Solid built. Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This Thing is heavy duty. I keep it outside on back patio and it gets rained on etc but has not faded or had any issues. Fun to use and very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Melwick8

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, especially for the price and compared to other brands that specialize in fitness equipment.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Epic Workout!
customer_reviews.text: This exercise tool provides a great challenge to any workout. I totally feel muscles I never realize I had! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: jal

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It's amazing a place near my house will sell the same product for $120. Thank you amazon for making things easy on this. My shoulders have develop very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: chain
customer_reviews.text: Wife got these for me. I like them alot. Very heavy... much more so than any battle ropes i've used before. Def. more anaerobic than aerobic.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Great for intensity workouts.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good substitute/alternative for when I don't feel like using my 2" 40 foot rope . Cover is great for keeping rope from getting dirty or damaged .
customer_reviews.author: charlie c.

customer_reviews.title: Durable, tough and moveable.
customer_reviews.text: Love the feel of this rope with the cover. It feels durable and tough. It is a great workout.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: High quality! I thought for the price it would be lower than average but it is great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great training rope!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product I received it yesterday and used it this morning and I had a great workout. It is as sturdy as the ones I use at the gym with my trainer and very comfortable to hold. It appears to be durable but only time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: jenialex

customer_reviews.title: This weight is good workout with many reps
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made rope. It is encased in a tough sleeve as well.
customer_reviews.author: Richard N. Schooping

customer_reviews.title: Get one without a cover on it.
customer_reviews.text: The cover is tearing after a few uses, but it works well otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley G

customer_reviews.title: Best rope for the price
customer_reviews.text: Not finding another sleeved rope like this, much less at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: For the price, so far this rope is great. It is heavy enough to give you a really great workout. I suggest you buy the longer rope as I did. It gives you a better workout.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Huston

customer_reviews.title: Should last a long time
customer_reviews.text: Love the rope, I should have gotten a longer one though. Make sure you get the right length. Very well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan M.

customer_reviews.title: Quality , exceeded expectation.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and met and exceeded expectations. Looks like it will last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: rick

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good rope, heavy and has a nylon cover. Great foe Cross Fit
customer_reviews.author: sean edwards

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love the rope it’s a great addition to my home gym.
customer_reviews.author: Stoney

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the money
customer_reviews.text: Has held up well and performs as expected. Seems to be of good quality. I would recommend making or buying some form of anchor point to keep the cover/rope from getting damaged. Makes for a good workout.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Durable, comfortable grip, and arrived on time! Very happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This are great quality and great price! I love them!!
customer_reviews.author: kjohn101

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy. The protective wrapper is strong and slides well on the floor. Best set of ropes I've ever actually used.
customer_reviews.author: Unassuming Gentleman

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for quality!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I’m hoping this will last thru all our heavy use. I have seen many that appear to be made the same at 3x the cost of this one.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Happy to get it
customer_reviews.text: Quality is good. So good for arms and upper body.👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Sant

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Very sturdy and durable. Use it at least weekly.
customer_reviews.author: JCK

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect battle rope. Bought it for our family owned gym. And our members love it! If you’re looking for one of these bad boys, look no further.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Benedix

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: I use the rope to workout 4-5 times a week and it is the perfect weight and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Warreng

customer_reviews.title: Heavy and durable.
customer_reviews.text: After hours of research I decided to get this rope. It exceeded my expectations, it’s heavy and super durable.

customer_reviews.title: Great for at home use
customer_reviews.text: Great for at home use! Definitely saves me a trip to the gym when i don’t want to go anywhere! Very durable!
customer_reviews.author: chas

customer_reviews.title: Great for a final exercise after back day
customer_reviews.text: It's a rope. It's heavy and get the body burning only after a few minutes of us. Great for a final exercise after back day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon King

customer_reviews.title: Very durable and easy to use product.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use for my entire family ( 2 adults and 3 youth ages 10-13)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It rocks!
customer_reviews.text: This rope is well made and does exactly what I wanted it to do.. great quick workout!
customer_reviews.author: bluzzzzzzz

customer_reviews.title: Great for burning fat
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tool to have if you want to tone and burn fat.
customer_reviews.author: anthony velez

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product/quality. Better than I imagined. Excellent price. TOUGH workout!
customer_reviews.author: JV

customer_reviews.title: Ropes for life
customer_reviews.text: Been using the battle ropes for about 2 months now. Use them every other day for endurance training. They are very durable and well made. Have not seen no tears after all the wear and tear. Love these ropes!!
customer_reviews.author: Willie

product_meta.title: Bonnlo Battle Exercise Training Rope with Protective Cover, 1.5"/2" Width Poly Dacron 30/40/50ft Length, Fitness Undulation Rope Exercise Cross Strength Training Circuits Workout
product_meta.description:
US Stock, fast delivery. Shipping by USPS, FEDEX AND UPS. 
This weighted rope is heavy duty and durable, it is hard to be frayed. Because we are using nylon sleeve cover to protect the rope from friction and fraying. 

BONNLO EXERCISE ROPE 
Work up a sweat with the Exercise Rope. This rope is known by many names, including a battling rope, combat rope, fitness rope, training rope fitness, undulation rope, conditioning rope, climbing rope. Inexpensive yet effective, the exercise rope makes a powerful choice for CrossFit trainers. Choose from 1.5-inch or 2-inch widths in various lengths, including 30, 40, 50 ft.

YOU WILL NEVER GET BORED
Say goodbye to those repetitive training sessions forever. With Rope Exercise you can slam, whip or drag, move in waves and enjoy the multiple benefits of this dynamic training instead of simple static lifting and treadmills sessions. Just 10 minutes with the heavy training ropes and you'll feel a nice burn in your upper body, core and legs. 

NYLON SLEEVE & COATED HANDLES
Designed to withstand rigorous use, the cover on surrounding the rope will help deter dirt and prevent the rope from fraying. This allows the battle rope to be used virtually anywhere. And the handles measure 1.5''/2” in diameter 7'' in length. Constructed of a heavy duty vinyl material on both ends and are perfect for training grip and hand strength. 

PORTABLE
The rope’s flexible design makes it easy to roll up and take almost anywhere—from home to the gym, park, or beach and back again. 

PACKAGE
1 x Battle Rope
1 x Manual
feature_bullets: 💪 UPGRADE NYLON PROTECTIVE COVER ON WHOLE ROPE: Bonnlo battle ropes 30ft is covered with the nylon sleeve to protect the whole exercise rope from friction and fraying. It is constructed in a way that it will not come apart. The external cover is thick, which is more durable and will last many years of usage. This cover is nondetachable.

💪 QUALITY COATED HANDLES: The handles measure 1.5” in diameter and 7” in length. Excellent grips at the ends to allow for you to better grip the strength ropes during your exercise workout. Heat shrink grips for improved grip and protection for your hands; guaranteed to never come off

💪 PERFECT DESIGN: Our training ropes 1.5 inch are originally designed to withstand the rigors of shipyard. We’ve simply made them shorter and used the best quality material available to provide the best weight to length ratio and make them virtually water, weather and shed proof. Also, The rope’s flexible design makes it easy to roll up and take almost anywhere—from home to the gym, park, or beach and back again. It can also be rolled up and stored out of the way when not in use.

💪 BENEFIT & SPECIFICATION: The heavy duty battle rope offers exceptional versatility. In addition to the familiar undulation exercises, the weighted rope can also be used for pulling or climbing exercises, whether alone or as part of a team. Measure 1.5” in diameter and 30ft in length. Weight: 20 LB. Package Dimension: 13”x13”x9”. It is perfect for your garage gym use.
💪 TOP CUSTOMER CARE: We fully stand behind our products. If you are not satisfied, please feel free to contact us, we will offer you the best way to solve all problems
